name: Login App Tracking Order (illustration)
description:
iGHTK is an application for consignees from Giaohangtietkiem.vn, log in with just a phone number and check the status of their orders in real time.

In the redes required by product improvement, I did a few options in the direction of illustration, but the design was not put into use on the official product, so I shared it with everyone.

You can view it in dribbble in this link:

https://dribbble.com/shots/18159620-UI-Login-iGHTK-App-for-tracking-your-order
